content.description: At time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math> two identical blocks, <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>A</mtext></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>B</mtext></mstyle></math> respectively, of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"> <mi>m</mi> </math> slide to the right across a horizontal surface. Block <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>A</mtext></mstyle></math> slides across a part of the surface where friction between the surface and the block is negligible. Block <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>B</mtext></mstyle></math> slides across a part of the surface where the coefficient of kinetic friction between the Block <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>B</mtext></mstyle></math> and the surface is <math alttext="mu sub k" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub></mstyle></math>. At time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>, both blocks have speed <math alttext="v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>.
content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the magnitude of the rate of change of momentum of the two-block system over the small interval of time <math alttext="delta t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math> after <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mstyle> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times m g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times m g delta t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 m v divided by delta t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>/</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="m v divided by delta t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>/</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times m g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
